channel.title: events on Apache Comdev
channel.description: Recent content in events on Apache Comdev

item.title: Apache Conferences Calendar
item.description: Deprecated - See New Calendar instead ¶ This calendar is no longer maintained; please see this page instead. This Calendar is maintained by the Apache Community Development Committee (ComDev), to have your event listed considered for addition please mail dev@community.apache.org. Note that to be listed in this calendar events must conform to the Third Party Event Branding Policy. Upcoming events ¶ List loading This Calendar is also available as an iCal feed

item.title: Apache Related Event Calendars
item.description: This calendar lists major events relating to The Apache Software Foundation and our many Apache projects. We also have an automated listing of upcoming Apache-related Meetups (smaller events) available. This Calendar is maintained by Apache Community Development volunteers (ComDev); to have your event listed considered for addition please mail dev@community.apache.org. Note that to be listed in this calendar events must already conform to the Third Party Event Branding Policy and have been approved by either the relevant Apache PMC or the Branding Committee.

item.title: Requirements for organizers of small Apache-related events
item.description: Approval of small Apache-related events ¶ The Community Development PMC is responsible for assisting with the organisation and promotion of all Apache events. Organizers of Apache-related events need approval for using the Apache trademarks in their event brandings. The main steps are: a) Get approval from the PMCs of the projects that your event is about. b) Abide by the Apache branding rules. c) Once brand use is approved by the respective PMCs, inform the community development PMC of your event, including references to PMCs approval.
